about_the_game:
GOLDEN SWIRL is an innovative Roguelike Deck Builder game that immerses players in a dark fantasy world full of mystery and challenges. Combining fast-paced combat with deep card-building mechanics, the game delivers a groundbreaking experience, offering an unparalleled journey through a haunting and magical realm.

Story Background

In the world of GOLDEN SWIRL, an ancient and enigmatic swirl has quietly emerged, consuming countless lives and souls. This whirlpool distorts the boundaries of reality and plunges the world into a dark abyss of the unknown. There is no absolute good or evil—only ever-shifting fates and choices. Players take on the role of an unnamed trial seeker, embarking on a journey to the ultimate destination, the Golden City, to uncover its mysterious connection to the swirl. As the adventure deepens, players will unveil the secrets of the Golden City and confront the core power of this twisted world.

Key Features

  • A Unique Fusion of Action and Strategy
    GOLDEN SWIRL seamlessly blends the action-packed combat with the strategic card-building gameplay, creating a revolutionary experience. Players craft tactics with a diverse array of cards while responding dynamically to enemies in intense battles, offering a highly challenging and rewarding gameplay loop.

  • Randomly Generated Adventures
    Every playthrough is a one-of-a-kind experience! Dungeons, enemies, and treasures are procedurally generated, requiring players to adapt to ever-changing environments. This ensures that every challenge is fresh and full of surprises.

  • Extensive Card and Skill Variety
    With a plethora of unique cards and skills, players can experiment with countless tactical possibilities. Each card carries immense magical power, allowing players to explore and refine their preferred combat style.

  • Swirl Breaching and Depravity System
    Every choice in GOLDEN SWIRL triggers the "Swirl Breaching" mechanic. These events not only affect gameplay progression but also gradually erode the protagonist's soul, altering their mental state and influencing strategic decisions. As Swirl Breaching accumulates, rising Depravity levels may unleash unpredictable effects and narrative twists, enriching the gameplay experience.

  • Customizable Gear and Relic System
    Players have the freedom to select and combine various equipment and relics to tailor their combat strategies. These items not only enhance combat capabilities but also provide unique effects and bonuses, ensuring every adventure feels dynamic and exciting. This system offers unparalleled flexibility, allowing players to adapt tactics against formidable foes and challenges.

  • Card Attributes Affect Combat Combos and Event Choices
    Each card's attributes influence not only combat combo effects but also event options within the game. Players must consider both battle synergy and potential special events or story branches when selecting and building their decks. This system adds greater strategic depth and variability, making every run filled with unique challenges and decisions.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10/11 (64-bi)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or higher
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU (e.g., NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
